SELECT nb.board_no AS boardNo, nb.notice_board_content AS boardContent, bb.board_title AS boardTitle, bb.board_writer AS boardWriter, bb.board_view AS boardView, bb.board_reg_date AS boardRegDate, bb.board_mod_date AS boardModDate, bb.category_board AS categoryBoard
FROM board_notice nb LEFT JOIN base_board bb ON bb.board_no = nb.board_no
WHERE bb.category_board LIKE 'NOTICE'
ORDER BY nb.board_no DESC;
